review: Great Product... No problems with set up! In fact, I bought another one to keep in another room.

review: Very simple device to setup and use.

review: I m very pleased with the Fire TV stick given all the movies, music, & games you get access to.....quite a large number are "Free" as a Prime member.Set up is easy & using this device is a breeze. I can watch current movies like " Unbroken " in the convience of my home.My children & grandson love it!

review: I am only hearing sound ,but I am not seeing picture

review: Excellent tool for cable cutters. Pluto + sling + netflix + games = bang for buck.

review: Absolutely amazing.  I wish I would have gotten it sooner!
